# hush_access_policy (Data Source)

Access policy data source for reading Hush Security access policy information



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of the access policy

### Read-Only

- `access_credential_id` (String) The ID of the access credential
- `attestation_criteria` (List of Object) The attestation criteria for the access policy (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--attestation_criteria))
- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp
- `delivery_config` (List of Object) The delivery configuration for the access policy (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--delivery_config))
- `deployment_ids` (List of String) The list of deployment IDs
- `description` (String) The description of the access policy
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the access policy is enabled
- `modified_at` (String) The modification timestamp
- `name` (String) The name of the access policy

<a id="nestedatt--attestation_criteria"></a>
### Nested Schema for `attestation_criteria`

Read-Only:

- `key` (String)
- `type` (String)
- `value` (String)


<a id="nestedatt--delivery_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `delivery_config`

Read-Only:

- `items` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--delivery_config--items))
- `type` (String)

<a id="nestedobjatt--delivery_config--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `delivery_config.items`

Read-Only:

- `key` (String)
- `value` (String)
